mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS userId, user_password AS userPassword, user_name AS userName, user_type AS userType, user_joindate AS userJoindate, user_createddate AS userCreatedDate, user_changedate AS userChangedDate, user_address AS userAddress, user_contactnumber AS userContactNumber, user_postalcode AS userPostalCode, order_number AS orderNumber, store_id AS storeId FROM users WHERE user_id = #{userId}
